title: OCMIP2 inert chemical tracers

url.description: So you want to simulate CFC-11 and CFC-12 in your ocean model according to standard OCMIP-2 protocols? This document provides step-by-step information to do just that.
url.name: OCMIP2 inert chemical tracers

abstract: This document provides step-by-step information to simulate CFC-11 and CFC-12 in your ocean model according to standard OCMIP-2 protocols.
